attributes.action: Start putting our wounded soldiers first!
attributes.additional_details: Story seen in the People newspaper.
attributes.background: After reading the story about Clive Smith an army veteran who had to remortgage his home to raise £90,000 for pioneering bionic limb surgery after losing both of his legs below the knees in Afghanistan, its time the government looked after its people who they send into these warzones!

rejection.details:
Petitions need to explain clearly what they want the UK Government or Parliament to do. 

We already have some petitions about ex-sevicemen and women. For example:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/104750

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/108022

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/107702
